{{Description|A will that surpasses time itself finally caused her to step aside and allow Eternity to enter a new chapter.<br>But behold, that thrilling battle at [[Mt. Yougou]] has been revived in the form of memories.<br>Relive her test once more, and you might just learn something new...|Memories: Guardian of Eternity}}
'''End of the Oneiric Euthymia''' is a [[Trounce Domain]] unlocked after completing the {{Quest|Transient Dreams}}. Players can relive their fight against [[The Shogun]] and receive rewards.

==Enemies==
{{Card|Magatsu Mitake Narukami no Mikoto|type=Enemy|show_caption=1}}

==Rules==
{{Transclude|Domain|trouncerule|section=1}}

==Ley Line Disorder==
* Magatsu Mitake Narukami no Mikoto will continuously absorb Ominous Destiny, and will gain more upon hitting characters. When Ominous Destiny is filled up, she will enter the Baleful Shadowlord form.
* While she is in this form, active characters will lose [[Elemental Energy]] at intervals. Magatsu Mitake Narukami no Mikoto will gain great [[Resistance|DMG RES]] and deal more fatal attacks. Use the appropriate [[elemental]] attacks to disable this form more quickly and obtain [[Energy]] in the process.
